caseTitle: Meera Shafi (Meeshah Shafi) v. Ali Zafar
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Updating construction of statutes - The word "attendance" in Order 18 Rule 4 CPC includes "virtual attendance". A civil court can allow, under Section 151 CPC and Article 164 QSO, recording the oral evidence of a witness through video conferencing. Right of cross-examination is neither unlimited nor unbridled. Judges of the trial courts should vigilantly check the misuse of this right.
